measure_info.long_name: Average Download Speed
measure_info.short_description: Average download speed weighted by number of devices.

measure_info.long_name: Number of devices
measure_info.short_description: The number of unique devices accessing Ookla Internet speed tests.
measure_info.statement: There are {value} unique devices in {features.name} accessing Ookla Internet speed tests.

measure_info.long_name: Percent of the Total Population with Fast Internet Speed
measure_info.short_description: Percent of the total population with a fast internet speed (above 100/20 MB/s, able to stream HD video on multiple devices or download large files quickly).
measure_info.statement: {value} of the total population in {features.name} has a fast internet speed.

measure_info.long_name: Percent of the Total Population with Good Internet Speed
measure_info.short_description: Percent of the total population with a good internet speed (above 25/3 MB/s, able to stream video or online game for one device).
measure_info.statement: {value} of the total population in {features.name} has a good internet speed.

measure_info.long_name: Percentage of households with broadband
measure_info.short_description: Percentage of households self-reported to have a broadband internet connection (any type of internet other than a dial-up)
measure_info.long_description: Percentage of households self-reported to have a broadband internet connection. Broadband internet is defined as any type of internet other than a dial-up. Based on American Community Survey Table B28002 in ACS 2015/2019 5-year estimates.
measure_info.statement: {value} of households in {features.name} have a broadband connection.

measure_info.short_name: Households with cable, fiber optic, or DSL
measure_info.long_name: Percentage of households with a high speed internet service (cable, fiber optic, or DSL)
measure_info.short_description: Percentage of households self-reported to have a high speed internet service (cable, fiber optic, or DSL)
measure_info.long_description: Percentage of households self-reported to have a high speed internet service. A high speed internet service is defined as a cable, fiber optic, or DSL internet connection. Based on American Community Survey Table B28002 in ACS 2015/2019 5-year estimates.
measure_info.statement: {value} of households in {features.name} have a cable, fiber optic, or DSL internet connection.

measure_info.long_name: Percentage of households without a computer
measure_info.short_description: Percentage of households self-reported to not have a computer or device at home
measure_info.long_description: Percentage of the households self-reported to not have a computer or device at home. Based on American Community Survey Table B28002 in ACS 2015/2019 5-year estimates.
measure_info.statement: {value} of households in {features.name} do not have a computer or device.
